advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
description:
Vevo offers the largest collection of premium official music videos. Start watching your favorite music videos and catch daily video premieres by downloading Vevo for iOS today.

Discover exciting new music videos, original shows, and live music performances from your favorite artists.

Stream live music performances, and discover new songs from your favorite artists.

Make playlists of your favorite pop, rock, rap, electronic, R&B, and country music videos. See a video you like? Add it to a playlist. Vevo recommends music videos while you’re watching, so the fun never has to end!

Sit back and relax with Vevo TV’s hand-curated music video channels. Stream from three channel choices: Hits (pop), Flow (hip hop & rap), and Nashville (country). Turn it on and enjoy an HD music experience that features everything from daily premieres to live music to the best classics.

Enjoy pop, rap, rock, R&B, electronic, country, and much more – the HD music video choices are endless on Vevo.

We also provide recommendations via your iTunes music library. We’ll scan your library and suggest videos that we know you’ll like.

Vevo will work over cellular (3G or LTE) network connections, but for the highest quality music video experience, we suggest accessing via Wi-Fi whenever possible.

Vevo is available in the United States, Australia, Brazil, Canada, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, The Netherlands, New Zealand, Poland, Spain and United Kingdom. If you travel outside these countries, Vevo will not be available.

PLEASE NOTE: Due to the nature of some licenses from the content owners, features and videos may not be available in all regions.
releaseNotes:
We've got a bunch of new features for you to enjoy! If you love Vevo, please take the time to give us a nice review. It really helps.

- You can now login via Google
- Keep track of what you've watched with our "Recently Watched" feature
- Improvements in search
- Overflow menu options are now available on Artists, Shows, and LIFT
- Tweets from your favorite artists have been added to the artist pages
- Links to artist pages have been added to the browse page
- Other bug fixes
